original_text: Moses then said to Aaron and his sons, “Cook the meat at the entrance to the tent of meeting and eat it there with the bread from the basket of ordination offerings, as I was commanded: ‘Aaron and his sons are to eat it.’
korean_text: 모세가 아론과 그의 아들들에게 이르되 내게 이미 명령하시기를 아론과 그의 아들들은 먹으라 하셨은즉 너희는 회막 문에서 그 고기를 삶아 위임식 광주리 안의 떡과 아울러 그 곳에서 먹고

sentences.original_text: Moses then said to Aaron and his sons,
"Cook the meat at the entrance to the tent of meeting
and eat it there with the bread from the basket of ordination offerings,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거기서 위임 제물 바구니의 빵과 함께 그것을 드세요,

sentences.original_text: 'Aaron and his sons are to eat it.'"
